text:
Hello,

I was creating a resource centre using HubSpot's blog functionality.
Each resource/article should redirect to a HubSpot landing page; to do this I created a custom module inside my resources to handle the metadata. ( the redirection url, the name of the button etc... )


It works well and I can retrieve this information quite easily using the widgets code: {{tag_<http://post.widgets.management/|post.widgets.management>.body.button_label}}




However my url cannot be retrieved and is always equal to "null" if my url type is "content" rather than "external"


Have you already experienced the problem?
